activities.name: Informed consent
activities.description: Obtain written informed consent from participant

activities.name: Admit to unit
activities.description: Admit participant to clinical research unit

activities.name: Discharge from unit
activities.description: Discharge participant from clinical research unit after completion of procedures and safety review

activities.name: Outpatient visit or phone call
activities.description: Single outpatient visit or phone call and safety laboratory assessment

activities.name: Inclusion/exclusion
activities.description: Assess inclusion and exclusion criteria

activities.name: Discuss/document contraception
activities.description: Discuss and document contraception requirements

activities.name: Follicle-stimulating hormone (post-menopausal females only)
activities.description: FSH test if needed to confirm menopause

activities.name: Alcohol test
activities.description: Alcohol screening test

activities.name: Urine drug screen
activities.description: Urine drug screening test

activities.name: HIV, hepatitis B and C screen
activities.description: Screening for HIV, hepatitis B and hepatitis C

activities.name: Medical history/demographics
activities.description: Collect medical history and demographics including age, sex, race and ethnicity where permitted

activities.name: WD history
activities.description: Wilson disease history including diagnosis date, method of diagnosis, history of cirrhosis, details of any previous liver biopsies performed, and treatment received

activities.name: Prior WD treatment
activities.description: Document prior Wilson disease treatment

activities.name: Physical examination
activities.description: Full or symptom-driven physical examination

activities.name: Height, weight, and BMI
activities.description: Measure height (screening only), weight, and calculate BMI

activities.name: Enrollment/inclusion
activities.description: Enroll participant and confirm inclusion

activities.name: Discontinue chelation therapy
activities.description: Discontinue chelation therapy

activities.name: Discontinue zinc therapy
activities.description: Discontinue zinc therapy

activities.name: ALXN1840 15 mg/day
activities.description: Administer ALXN1840 at 15 mg/day dose

activities.name: ALXN1840 30 mg/day
activities.description: Administer ALXN1840 at 30 mg/day dose

activities.name: Study intervention compliance
activities.description: Confirm study intervention administration via SMS text messaging during outpatient period

activities.name: Blood sampling for PK: Plasma total Mo and PUF-Mo
activities.description: Blood sampling for pharmacokinetics - plasma total molybdenum and plasma ultrafiltrate molybdenum

activities.name: PD: Plasma total and PUF-Cu, LBC, ceruloplasmin, ceruloplasmin-bound Cu
activities.description: Pharmacodynamic sampling for plasma total and PUF copper, labile bound copper, ceruloplasmin, and ceruloplasmin-bound copper

activities.name: Chemistry, hematology, Coagulation
activities.description: Serum chemistry, hematology, and coagulation laboratory tests

activities.name: Urinalysis
activities.description: Urinalysis laboratory test

activities.name: Urine/serum pregnancy test
activities.description: Pregnancy test (urine or serum)

activities.name: Retained serum sample (safety)
activities.description: Single 15 mL serum sample retained for evaluation in event of unexpected safety finding

activities.name: Vitals sign measurements
activities.description: Vital signs including body temperature, heart rate, respiratory rate, and systolic and diastolic blood pressure

activities.name: 12-lead ECG (triplicate)
activities.description: Triplicate 12-lead electrocardiogram

activities.name: Adverse events
activities.description: Adverse event monitoring and documentation

activities.name: Cu/Mo-controlled meals
activities.description: Copper- and molybdenum-controlled diet meals

activities.name: Light exercise regimen
activities.description: Light exercise regimen

activities.name: Urination and bowel movement monitoring, menstruation check
activities.description: Monitor urination and bowel movements; menstruation check for women

activities.name: 24-hour urine for Cu and Mo
activities.description: 24-hour urine collection for copper and molybdenum measurement

activities.name: Feces for Cu and Mo
activities.description: Fecal sample collection for copper and molybdenum measurement

activities.name: Concomitant medication and non-pharmacologic therapy/procedure
activities.description: Document concomitant medications and non-pharmacologic therapies/procedures
